columns.name: cust_subscription_id
columns.description: The RDS event notification subscription Id.

columns.name: customer_aws_id
columns.description: The AWS customer account associated with the RDS event notification subscription.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the event subscription.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the RDS event notification subscription, it can be one of the following: creating | modifying | deleting | active | no-permission | topic-not-exist.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: A Boolean value indicating if the subscription is enabled. True indicates the subscription is enabled.

columns.name: sns_topic_arn
columns.description: The topic ARN of the RDS event notification subscription.

columns.name: source_type
columns.description: The source type for the RDS event notification subscription.

columns.name: subscription_creation_time
columns.description: The time the RDS event notification subscription was created.

columns.name: event_categories_list
columns.description: A list of event categories for the RDS event notification subscription.

columns.name: source_ids_list
columns.description: A list of source IDs for the RDS event notification subscription.
